title: Second round of counselling
content: is it possible for me to upgrade to aiml during second round my rank is 16xx

comments.body: Sorry to say this but the cutoff for Second round is 8000 as per schedule. So, I don't think that's possible.
Yea but i did get within 8k i got within 2k itself
oh sorry i read your rank as 16xxx. That's a pretty good rank! There's a high possibility that you can upgrade then, Good lucküçÄ
Which branch are you upgrading from?
I think you can get core CS as well in ECC, not sure.
no seats left in aiml to upgrade though üíÄ
